definition: to leave (a message etc)/to retain/to stay/to remain/to keep/to preserve

sentences.english: Turns out that the venom’s viscosity keeps it nestled in the groove.
sentences.chinese: 原来，是毒液的粘性使其滞留在导流槽里的。

sentences.english: Thus your ship is unseaworthy, and she will be detained in our port.
sentences.chinese: 所以你的船是不适航的，将会在本港被滞留。

sentences.english: It happens when water gets trapped in your ears and allows bacteria or fungi to flourish.
sentences.chinese: 当水滞留在耳内并使细菌或真菌滋生时就会生这种病。

sentences.english: For life goes not backward not tarries with yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 因为生命无法倒流，也不会滞留于昨日。

sentences.english: Officials believe the shallow water will continue hindering shipping until June.
sentences.chinese: 官员预期，浅水滞留船只会持续到六月。

sentences.english: The shutdown reportedly caused numerous flights delays in and out of Newark, stranding thousands of passengers.
sentences.chinese: 据报道，许多航班因此延误，上千旅客滞留机场。

sentences.english: So the heating from black carbon lasts a little longer" than it lingers in the air.
sentences.chinese: 所以黑碳的放热比它滞留空中时间略长一点”。

sentences.english: Tickets of the Navigation Co. entitle the holder to break the journey at London and Paris.
sentences.chinese: 该轮船公司的船票容许持票人在伦敦和巴黎滞留。

sentences.english: The air seeps out into the skin and gets trapped.
sentences.chinese: 空气渗进了肺部的外表，并滞留在肺里。

sentences.english: Or are you cruising just above the tree tops - or stuck on the runway?
sentences.chinese: 你是在树丛上空巡航呢，还是滞留在机场跑道上？

sentences.english: Many others overstay their tourist visas.
sentences.chinese: 还有很多持旅游签证，逾期滞留。

sentences.english: At present, Chinese tourists and delegations in Egypt have been basically taken back.
sentences.chinese: 目前，滞留埃及的中国游客和团组人员已基本接回。

sentences.english: Assassins seldom hang around after they finish an assignment.
sentences.chinese: 刺客完成任务后，几乎不会滞留在案发地。

sentences.english: An abnormal distention of body tissues caused by retentionofair.
sentences.chinese: 气肿因空气滞留而引起的体组织的不正常的扩张。

sentences.english: Icy weather strands thousands of vehicles in SW China.
sentences.chinese: 凝冻天气致云南昭通数千车辆滞留。

sentences.english: Thousands of travelers are still stuck in Denver.
sentences.chinese: 数千名的旅客仍然滞留丹佛机场。

definition: to stay/to remain/to linger/(computing) to reside/resident (program etc)
to keep stationed (of troops)/to remain as a garrison
to return to/to come (or go) back
